name: Pivot Puzzles
description: Roll the ball to the finish pole by tilting the board with your mouse while avoiding the holes. Play and complete 15 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo/AMD Phenom X4, or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated 3D Accelerated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
